meanings.definition: The act or process of solidifying again.
meanings.sent1: After the ice melted, the resolidification turned it back into a solid block.
meanings.sent2: The resolidification of the chocolate made it harden into a delicious treat.
meanings.sent3: The resolidification of the jelly made it wobble like a jiggly cube.
meanings.sent4: The resolidification of the lava created a new layer of rock on the volcano.
meanings.sent5: The resolidification of the candle wax formed intricate patterns as it cooled.
